original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Put forth thine hand, and take it by the tail. And he put forth his hand, and caught it, and it became a rod in his hand:
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 네 손을 내밀어 그 꼬리를 잡으라 그가 손을 내밀어 그것을 잡으니 그의 손에서 지팡이가 된지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses
and take it by the tail
And he put forth his hand
and it became a rod in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그의 손 안에서 지팡이가 되었다
